main event: A civilian observed a round object resembling the size of a quarter at arm's length flying at high speed in Radium Springs, New Mexico, on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was flying at an altitude between 1100 and 1500 feet., The object changed direction and descended before disappearing behind a hill., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The object emitted flashing lights and had a red glow., The object was silent throughout the observation.
sighted object: a round object with flashing lights and a red glow
